snippet.title: Blueberry Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist Blueberry on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1536120/Blueberry/
Follow us on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/GamesMellow
Follow Blueberry on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blueberry_game/

Blueberry is a narrative platformer in which the player climbs the tower of life on a journey through a woman’s mind from birth to death while putting together the puzzle of her memories, searching for missing pieces and unraveling the story of Blueberry’s past trauma.
